Class PetriNetAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.pneditor.petrinet.PetriNetInterface
org.pneditor.petrinet.adapters.lachguer.souissi.PetriNetAdapter
public class PetriNetAdapter extends org.pneditor.petrinet.PetriNetInterface
Adapter class to link the `PetriNetInterface` from PNEditor with the `PetriNet` class from the custom PetriNet implementation.
